articles.content:

articles.title: Stock futures rise slightly with S&P 500, Nasdaq on six-day losing streak - CNBC
articles.description: Wall Street is looking for a rebound week after key tech stocks like Nvidia struggled.
articles.content:
Stock futures pushed higher Monday as Wall Street looks to find its footing following a steep sell off for tech companies, which face a key test this week.
